Content: The court today ordered to further remand former Defence Secretary Hemasiri Fernando and IGP Pujith Jayasundera. The former Defence Secretary and the IGP are accused of not taking precautionary measures to avert the Easter Sunday terror attack. Hemasiri Fernando and Pujith Jayasundera were represented before Colombo Additional Magistrate Priyantha Liyanage. The Magistrate ordered to remand the two suspects till the 19th of this month. While considering a revision application filed by the Attorney General, the Colombo high court previously suspended the order given by another court to release them on bail. Accordingly, they were remanded on the 9th of October.
